<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">

<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>This</title>
</head>

<body>
    <script>const url_ = 'https://flexinet.fleximatic.com.mx/APIS/AppFleximatic/categorias.json';

async function getCategorias() {
  let response = await fetch(url_);
  let json = await response.json();
  return json;
} //Forma 1


const test = () => {
  getCategorias().then(data => {
    const categorias = JSON.stringify(data);
    console.log(categorias);
  }).catch(reason => console.log(reason.message));
}; //Forma 2


const test2 = async () => {
  try {
    const dato = await getCategorias();
    const categorias = JSON.stringify(dato);
    console.log(categorias);
  } catch (error) {
    console.log(error);
  }
};</script>
</body>

</html>
